compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/mac/Projects/Personal/PDF-Upload-.serviceRawFile:
service: pdf-upload-backend-serverless

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x # Updated runtime from nodejs14.x to nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  environment:
    S3_BUCKET: ${self:custom.s3BucketName}
    DYNAMO_DB_TABLE: ${self:custom.dynamodbTableName}

functions:
  uploadPDF:
    handler: handler.uploadPDF
    timeout: 900
    events:
      - http:
          path: upload
          method: post
          cors: true

  getFiles:
    handler: handler.getFiles
    events:
      - http:
          path: files
          method: get
          cors: true

custom:
  serverless-offline:
    httpPort: 4000
  dynamodbTableName: rockland-pdf-upload-history  # Your existing DynamoDB table name
  s3BucketName: rockland-pdf-file-upload      # Your existing S3 bucket name

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
